api desktop api object class get active obj parent function OBJECT.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT Function> Returns a pointer to the parent container of the object that has focus. Container_Object as P = .GetActiveObjParent()
The <OBJECT>.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT() method applies to:
Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
The <OBJECT>.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT()returns a pointer to the container of the object that has focus.
Desktop applications only.
